carpet.rule.optimizedFallDamageRaycast.d: Disable fallDamageRaycast while the entity is moving upwards. Ported from chronos carpet by bread, pentasteve.
carpet.rule.optimizedFallDamageRaycast.e: Ported from chronos carpet by bread, pentasteve
carpet.rule.commandView.desc: Enable /view command to changes the view distance of the server without op
carpet.rule.commandSimulation.desc: Enable /simulation command to change the simulation distance of the server without op
carpet.rule.commandHat.desc: Allows you to equip items to your head slot using /hat
carpet.rule.commandSit.desc: Player can sit down when using /sit
carpet.rule.commandNotice.desc: Enable /notice command to change logger 'notice' message
carpet.rule.loginNotifier.desc: notice to you when you logged in
carpet.rule.disableWanderingOnCart.desc: entity on minecart should not do wandering pathfinding
carpet.rule.disableNetherPortalCollision: Disable laggy nether portal collision checks introduced in 1.19.3
Large mobs may suffocate when going through portals if you enable this
Ported from chronos carpet by bread, pentasteve
carpet.rule.blockEntitySyncing.desc: Enable sync of blockEntity on the server without op
